name: Kage No Shuuen (Shadow's Demise)
description:
You are Kage, renowned Shinobi. Enter the fortress of local Daimio Hideki to find proof of his betrayal to the Shogun. Will you be able to survive the many dangers awaiting?

Plays with keyboard and mouse. Controls are shown in-game. Press Esc to pause the game and access the options menu.

This is a stealth-action, 3rd-person, 3D game influenced by the old Tenchus from the PSX era. This project was done in the framework of an advanced videogame programming bootcamp with Unity and is thus a short proof of concept applying the material learnt throughout the course. It will take around 15-20 minutes to beat at best.

It is a bit rough around the edges and it has some bugs. Try not to get hit while using the hook :).

I hope you enjoy it and am happy about any feedback you may have!
